long_description: The women's lightweight, compact Sherpani Slip LE Wallet organizes your daily essentials and sports a convenient, removable carry strap that can be worn over your shoulder or across your body. Internal organization includes a phone sleeve and checkbook pocket. Slips easily into a tote bag or carry-on luggage. The Sherpani Slip LE wallet has a slim design with exterior embroidery and floral lining.
short_description: The women's lightweight, compact Sherpani Slip LE Wallet organizes your daily essentials and sports a convenient, removable carry strap that can be worn over your shoulder or across your body.
